title: 365. Q&AF: Overcoming Stagnation, Gaining Connections Vs. Developing Skills & Dealing With Shadow Bans
itunes:title: 365. Q&AF: Overcoming Stagnation, Gaining Connections Vs. Developing Skills & Dealing With Shadow Bans
description: In today's episode, Andy answers your questions on how to overcome the comfort you experience after reaching a bit of success, whether you should put more focus on gaining connections or developing your skillsets when working towards your goals, and how to navigate being shadow banned on social media for speaking out on crucial issues happening in our society.
